fun filterCountriesByName(searchString: String, countries: Array<Object>): Array<Object> = countries filter (country) -> contains(lower((country.name.common)) , lower(searchString))
fun filterByPopulation(countries: Array<Object>, limitInMillions: Number): Array<Object> = countries filter (country) -> country.population < (limitInMillions * 1000000)
fun sortCountries(countriesArray, sortOrder) = if (sortOrder == "ascend") countriesArray orderBy $.name.common else (countriesArray orderBy $.name.common)[-1 to 0]
